deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title FixedPriceSeller
        An ERC777 token operator contract that sells tokens at a fixed price.

Set the price for each token.  The price is in Wei, so if for example
 the price is 1 Ether for 1 token then _pricePerToken would be 10^18.

Get the price for each token.  The price is in Wei, so if for example
 the price is 1 Ether for 1 token this would return 10^18.
Send tokens from a holder at their price
Checks and state update to carry out prior to sending tokens
State update to carry out after sending tokens

devdoc.title: FixedPriceSeller        An ERC777 token operator contract that sells tokens at a fixed price.

getPricePerToken(address,address).notice: Get the price for each token.  The price is in Wei, so if for example the price is 1 Ether for 1 token this would return 10^18.

send(address,address).notice: Send tokens from a holder at their price

setPricePerToken(address,uint256).notice: Set the price for each token.  The price is in Wei, so if for example the price is 1 Ether for 1 token then _pricePerToken would be 10^18.
